definition: Ladakh, the eastern part of Jammu and Kashmir in northwest India, adjacent to Kashmir and Tibet, know as "Little Tibet"
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: School children play inside a charity school in Leh, capital of Ladakh September 24, 2007 .
sentences.chinese: 學童在拉達克首府列的一間慈善學校內玩遊戲。

sentences.english: Even as compared with Ladakh, NEFA is an alarming sight.
sentences.chinese: 即使與拉達克相比較，這也是個令人膽戰心驚的地方。
